{"step_by_step_thinking": "The child presented with pain and a mass in the right lumbar region, with no fever. The pain increased on extension and X-ray showed spine changes. Based on these findings, the most probable diagnosis is Psoas abscess. Psoas abscess is characterized by pain in the lumbar region, a mass in the right lumbar region, and spine changes on imaging.
